name: Kryptonite
description: On contact or close proximity to kryptonite, user loses all its powers

name: No money
description: When poor, user becomes nearly useless

name: Emotional manipulation
description: Due to his past, user is easily manipulated by emotional means

name: Lack of sleep

name: Literally fkn Yellow
